description: Brett Lake is finally on leave and he heads over to Dante Colle’s place so he can crash for a few days. He is more than welcomed by the athletic, military hunk who invites him in and offers him a hot shower. Brett is so horny that the blue-eyed stud whips out his wall dildo and gets to work on his ass. A curious Dante can hear him moaning and decides to check it out. He slowly enters the bathroom and is more than pleased to find him in prime position! He wastes no time offering up the real thing.
title: On Leave Part 2
